game.name: Kebechet Daughter of Anpu
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Kebechet Daughter of Anubis is a third person roguelike action game. Master the art of Seal Sequence Spell casting as you battle corrupted hordes to cleanse the Exanimus and restore Ma'at to the world.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Kebechet Daughter of Anubis is a third person roguelike action game. Master the art of Seal Sequence Spell casting as you battle corrupted hordes to cleanse the Exanimus and restore Ma'at to the world.
